title: The DEI whiplash continues
description: There’s no real way to get around the fact that 2025 was a very rough year for those championing diversity, equity, belonging and inclusion. And many of us thought 2020 was the most taxing in a long while. But amid the scourge of the COVID-19 pandemic back in 2020, many of us from historically marginalized...
